DOC.brief_summary: To determine the dose or doses of PF-00547659 that will be the most effective to improve or halt the disease symptoms in patients with moderate to severe ulcerative colitis.
DOC.brief_title: A Study Of PF-00547659 In Patients With Moderate To Severe Ulcerative Colitis
DOC.criteria: Subjects with diagnosis of Ulcerative Colitis for 3 or more months. Ulcerative colitis must be active beyond the rectum. Must active Ulcerative Colitis with a Total Mayo Score of 6 to 12 points Pregnant or breast feeding. Diagnosis of indeterminate colitis or Crohn's Disease Subjects with history of colonic or small bowel obstruction or resection.
